title: Instructional Design Simulation Training for Volleyball Passing Test Tool Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A VR-based experiential program for pre-service/in-service teachers to develop ADDIE model-driven tools while learning integrated mathematical measurement principles and sports science techniques.

learning_goals: Learners can design a prototype of a volleyball passing test tool by applying the five phases (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) of the ADDIE model
Learners can implement a passing accuracy measurement system using sensor-based data collection and statistical analysis techniques in a VR simulation environment
Learners can evaluate tool performance based on expert validation indicators (convenience, usefulness, security, innovativeness) and derive improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
